title: Teshuvot HaGeonim
text: Reuben said to Shimon: Give me my deposit that I gave you to look after. Shimon said to him: I did not receive the deposit from you and I don't need to הא ביתא קמך. And he said the direction that you brought the deposit. I said to him: Rather, the things that I do not need הא ביתא קמך, if Shimon has witnesses בהא ביתא קמך and Reuben receives or thanks (?) him
